name: vitepress-knowledge-server
description: Self-hosted server for hosting the Chat UI for your VitePress website

scripts.docker:build: bun run build && docker build -t vitepress-knowledge-server .
scripts.docker:preview: bun run build && docker build -t vitepress-knowledge-server .
scripts.docker:push: docker tag vitepress-knowledge-server aklinker1/vitepress-knowledge-server && docker push aklinker1/vitepress-knowledge-server
